title: I Love Pirates
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR90L
description: Everyone likes to pretend! In I Love Pirates, students will experience an imaginary trip on a pirate ship. The characters in the story love many things about pirates and so will young readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and locate supporting details, and to understand nouns. Colorful illustrations help students understand the setting, and repetitive sentences and high-frequency words support early emergent readers.
meta: gold, love, parrots, ropes, sails, ships
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial and Final Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant Pp
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
